notes:
[Ruinous Path] is both the money pick, and probably the best spot removal spell in the set. The Awaken upside potential gives it an edge over [Stasis Snare].

Other than that there's nothing great in this pack. You could take [Serene Steward], start cutting WB Lifegain, and hope either [Kalastria Healer] or [Retreat to Hagra] come back.
